StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetEventPlanSubjects]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@EventId uniqueidentifier AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT p.LastName + ' ' + p.FirstName + ' ' + CAST(ISNULL(p.MiddleName, '') AS VARCHAR) AS PersonName , pr.ProspectId INTO #PROSPECTING_PERSON FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.Person p INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect pr ON p.PersonId = pr.PersonId INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventPlanSubject] es ON es.SubjectId = pr.ProspectId WHERE es.EventId = @EventId
SELECT p.LAST_NAME + ' ' + p.FIRST_NAME + ' ' + CAST(ISNULL(p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, '') AS VARCHAR) AS PersonName ,n.rowguid INTO #NWA_PERSON FROM MCRISS.dbo.NWA n INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Person p ON p.PERSON_ID = n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventPlanSubject] es ON es.SubjectId = n.rowguid WHERE es.EventId = @EventId
SELECT [Id] ,[EventId] ,[SubjectId] ,[SubjectName] --,'WA' [WorkingArea] ,wk.SectorDesignator + cast(isnull(wk.DESIGNATOR, '') as varchar) [WorkingArea] ,COALESCE(nwa.PersonName,prsp.PersonName) AS PersonName FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventPlanSubject] es Le. Join ( Select hsp.rowguid, SectorDesignator, DESIGNATOR from [MCRISS].[DBO].[HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE] hsp Inner Join [MCRISS].[DBO].[HIGH_SCHOOL] hs on hs.SCHOOL_CODE=hsp.SCHOOL_CODE Inner join [MCRISS].[DBO].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] ro on ro.ORGANIZATION_ID=hs.ORGANIZATION_ID Inner Join [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MapsSector] ms on ms.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId=ro.rowguid Inner Join [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MapsSectorZip] mz on mz.SectorID = ms.SectorID and mz.Zip = le.(hs.ZIP_CODE, 5) ) wk on wk.rowguid = es.SubjectId LEFT OUTER JOIN #PROSPECTING_PERSON prsp ON prsp.ProspectId = es.SubjectId LEFT OUTER JOIN #NWA_PERSON nwa ON nwa.rowguid = es.SubjectId WHERE EventId=@EventId
DROP TABLE #PROSPECTING_PERSON DROP TABLE #NWA_PERSON END
